front.title: Supporting Mobility for Multimedia with SIP

abstract.t: Session Initiation Protocol (SIP) is rapidly gaining widespreadacceptance as the signaling protocol of choice for fixed and mobileInternet multimedia and telephony services. This document focuses onhow one can utilize SIP to support real-time multimedia applicationsof roaming users on an end-to-end basis from users' terminals withoutreliance on network elements.
